column2: Farmmi, Inc. supplies agricultural products. The company is headquartered in Lishui, Zhejiang and currently employs 101 full-time employees. The firm is focused on processing and selling edible fungi. The firm produces and sells four categories of agricultural products such as Shiitake mushrooms, Mu Er mushrooms, other edible fungi, and other agricultural products such as tea. Edible fungi are edible fruit bodies of several species of macrofungi. Edible fungi have high nutritional value. Shiitake (Xiang Gu in Chinese and Lentinula edodes in Latin) is a variety of mushroom that originated from Eastern Asia. The firm also sells non-fungi agricultural products on its online store Farmmi Liangpin Market.
